ai-patthana17.28:0.2_0: Having given the immaterial states produced by the phenomena that are counterpart of
ai-patthana17.28:0.3_0: for one who gets close to the feelings,
ai-patthana17.28:1.1_0: Not insisting on the pleasant feeling, the teaching doesn’t give rise to the associated state of pleasant feeling.
ai-patthana17.28:2.1_0: Not in regard to such a thing as painful feeling, the teaching doesn’t associated with painful feeling, or neutral feeling arises conditioned by repulsion.
ai-patthana17.28:3.1_0: Neutral feeling arises dependent on a neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling. It doesn’t give rise to pleasant feeling.
